string-array.item: Bus Stop Hansung Uni. St. exit 6

string-array.name: sgc_desc
string-array.item: rd Floor, Seoul Press Center, City Hall Station, Line 1, Exit 4/5
Gangnam Station, Line 2, Take Exit 1, Walk straight till you reach first intersection. Turn right and walk for 100 or 200 meters. Yeoksam Global Village will be on left side of road.
Nearest station to go to Itaewon Hanam Global Village Center, Exit 2
Nearest Station to Seoul Global Center, Take Exit 4/5
Nearest Subway Station to Yeoksam Global Village Center, Exit 1
Go out of Exit 6, Express Bus Terminal Station Line 3,7 and take Bus 13 (maeul), Drop out at Seroe Stop
nearest Subway Station To Seorae Global Village Center. Go out of Exit 6, take Bus no. 13 (maeul)
Nearest Subway Station to Ichon Global Village Center. Exit 4
Daerim Staion, Line 2,7.>Take Exit 10, and walk straight. Yeongdeungpo Multicultural Village Center will be on your left before intersection
nearest subway station to Yeongdeungpo Multicultural Village Centre, exit 10
nearest Subway Station to Seongbuk Global Village Centre, take exit 6
Hansung University Station Line.4, Exit 6.Take Bus no 1111 or 2112 or Seongbuk Bus 03. Drop out at Ssangdori Stop and walk for 50 meters
